name: TheAtlantic
text: "Apparently, Obama’s remarks on Snapchat had revealed his indifference to police killings and racist policies, his callousness toward grieving families, and his unwillingness to believe the testimony of the bereaved," @CaitlinPacific writes: https://t.co/MFNXZD4dFH

name: TheAtlantic
text: "It’s not just Donald Trump, many Republican state leaders, and several thousand COVID-19 deniers who have waged a war against scientific comprehension. America’s virus illiteracy spans the partisan divide," @DKThomp writes: https://t.co/mVrYli9zmf

name: TheAtlantic
text: The GOP is moving away from being a small-"d" democratic party—and could morph into something very different, @RonBrownstein writes. https://t.co/mOGTXRy8KR

name: TheAtlantic
text: The GOP is moving away from being a small-"d" democratic party—and could morph into something very different, @RonBrownstein writes. https://t.co/vVWvMm8zqO

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Republican officials aren’t afraid of Trump so much as they are afraid of Republican voters. And Republican voters appear to be afraid of democracy," writes @GrahamDavidA: https://t.co/p7QehU1YOh

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Until earlier this year, I was a prosecutor at the Justice Department who specialized in financial fraud, so I know firsthand that the government does not criminally charge every false statement that it identifies," Ankush Khardori writes: https://t.co/JGfaLf4WHG

name: TheAtlantic
text: "When they say the 2020 election was stolen, Trumpists are expressing their view that the votes of rival constituencies should not count, even though they understand, on some level, that they do," @AdamSerwer writes: https://t.co/OHTCUJpe2T

name: TheAtlantic
text: 1.4 million new cases; 106,000 hospitalizations; 15,966 deaths. Even in a horrible year, this week stands out, writes @COVID19tracking. https://t.co/IWmduONuCo

name: TheAtlantic
text: An FDA advisory committee has voted to authorize the first COVID-19 vaccine in the U.S. It should be administered to the first Americans in the coming days, @jameshamblin reports. https://t.co/5ymxwhnk4T
